short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Open YouTube playlist videos without the playlist in a new tab.
short.de: Öffnen Sie YouTube -Playlist -Videos ohne die Wiedergabeliste in einer neuen Registerkarte.
short.es: Abra los videos de la lista de reproducción de YouTube sin la lista de reproducción en una nueva pestaña.
short.it: Apri i video di playlist di YouTube senza la playlist in una nuova scheda.
short.ja: 新しいタブにプレイリストなしでYouTubeプレイリストビデオを開きます。
short.ko: 새 탭에서 재생 목록없이 YouTube 재생 목록 비디오를 엽니 다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a context menu item specific to YouTube video links that include a playlist ID, that allows you to open the link in a new tab as standalone videos without the (autoplaying) playlist. 

This is a port of the Firefox extension of the same name created by Klemens Schölhorn.

Source available at: https://github.com/navin09/cr-youtube-no-playlist
